description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Prawn Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crispy Prawn Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tsp smoked paprika, save 1/2 tsp to garnish for later
2 tbs extra virgin olive oil, for dressing

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the dressing ingredients in a bowl. Season and chill until ready to serve. Peel and devein prawns, leaving tails intact.
Whisk eggs in a bowl, and place flour and breadcrumbs in separate bowls. Add paprika to the flour and season each bowl.

Half fill a saucepan with oil and place over medium heat until oil reaches 180Â°C. Working in batches, coat prawns in flour, then egg, then crumbs. Fry in batches for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Remove and drain on paper towel.

Cut lettuce into wedges and arrange on a platter with celery and cucumber. Add prawns and onion and drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle with extra paprika, to serve. Note: You can prepare the prawns a couple of hours ahead of time. Place on a plate and refrigerate until ready to cook.
